1.title: Dharmendra
1.plot: Kapil Sharma welcomes Navjot Singh Sidhu as a guest on show. Dharmendra enters as the special guest of the day. A few people from the audience get a chance to speak to Dharmendra.

2.title: Vidya Balan and Emraan Hashmi
2.plot: Vidya Balan and Emraan Hashmi promote their movie Ghanchakar.

3.title: Sonakshi Sinha and Ranveer Singh
3.plot: Sonakshi Sinha and Ranveer Singh appear to promote 'Lootera'.

4.title: Sunil Shetty and Johhny Lever
4.plot: Sunil Shetty and Johhny Lever visit Kapil's house to promote their film Enemmy.

5.title: Deepika, Shah Rukh Khan & Rohit Shetty
5.plot: Shahrukh Khan, Deepika Padukone and Rohit Shetty visit Kapil's house to promote their film Chennai Express.

6.title: Deepika, SRK & Rohit Shetty
6.plot: Chennai Express promotional episode continues with Shahrukh Khan, Deepika Padukone and Rohit Shetty as special guests.

7.title: Prabhudeva and Girish
7.plot: Prabhudeva and Girish Kumar appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil to promote their film Ramaiya Vastavaiya.

8.title: Huma Qureshi and Nawazuddin Siddique
8.plot: Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Huma Qureshi visit Kapil Sharma's house to promote their film Shorts.

9.title: Irfan Khan and Arjun Rampal
9.plot: Irfan Khan and Arjun Rampal visit Kapil Sharma's house to promote their film D-Day.

10.title: Tusshar Kapoor and Ravi Kishan
10.plot: Tusshar Kapoor and Ravi Kishan visit Kapil Sharma's house to promote their film Bajate Raho.

11.title: Kirron Kher
11.plot: Kirron Kher visits Comedy Nights with Kapil as a special guest.

12.title: Tina Dutta and Avika Gor
12.plot: Tina Dutta who plays the role of Meethi in the TV show Uttaran and Avika Gor who plays the role of Roli in the TV show Sasural Simar Ka appear as special guests on Comedy Nights with Kapil.

13.title: Shahrukh Khan and Rohit Shetty
13.plot: Shahrukh Khan and Rohit Shetty visit Kapil's house once again to promote their film Chennai Express.

14.title: Mika Singh
14.plot: Singer Mika Singh joins Kapil Sharma in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

15.title: Akshay Kumar, Sonakshi Sinha and Imran Khan
15.plot: Akshay Kumar, Sonakshi Sinha and Imran Khan appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai Dobara.

16.title: Anu Malik
16.plot: Music Composer Anu Malik joins Kapil Sharma in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

17.title: Riteish Deshmukh, Aftab Shivdasani & Vivek Oberoi
17.plot: Riteish Deshmukh, Aftab Shivdasani and Vivek Oberoi appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Grand Masti.

18.title: Ranjeet, Nikitin Dheer & Prem Chopra
18.plot: Three popular villains of Indian Film Industry, Prem Chopra, Ranjeet and Nikitin Dheer join Kapil Sharma in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

19.title: Ajay Devgan and Prakash Jha
19.plot: Ajay Devgan and Prakash Jha visit Kapil's house to promote their film Satyagraha.

20.title: Usha, Renuka and Smita
20.plot: Usha Nadkarni, Renuka Israni and Smita Bansal, all of whom play the role of Mother-In-Law in popular television shows join Kapil Sharma in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

21.title: Ram Charan and Priyanka Chopra
21.plot: Ram Charan and Priyanka Chopra visit Kapil's house to promote their film Zanjeer.

22.plot: Sushant Singh Rajput, Parineeti Chopra and Vaani Kapoor visit Kapil's house to promote their film Shuddh Desi Romance.

23.title: Juhi Chawla
23.plot: Bittoo Sharma tries to fool his boss so as to save his job but things don't exactly go according to plan. Later on Juhi Chawla arrives to meet Bittoo Sharma's crazy family.

24.title: Shahid Kapoor & Ileana D'Cruz
24.plot: Shahid Kapoor and Ileana D'Cruz visit Kapil's house to promote their film Phata Poster Nikhla Hero.

25.plot: Ranbir Kapoor and Pallavi Sharda visit Bittu Sharma's house for the promotion of their movie Besharam.

29.plot: Bittu Sharma and his family move to their village after their house is burned down. Kangana Ranaut visits their house for the promotion of her film Rajjo.

30.plot: Akshay Kumar, Shiv Pandit, Aditi Rao Hydari and Ronit Roy appear to promote 'Boss (2013)'

31.plot: Film Director and Choreographer Farah Khan joins Kapil Sharma in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

32.plot: Bittu Sharma falls into a trap laid down by an insurance agent and later on Sonu Nigam makes a guest appearance in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

42.plot: Hema Malini makes a guest appearance in the show.

43.plot: Madhuri Dixit and Huma Qureshi visit Kapil Sharma's house to promote their film Dedh Ishqiya.

44.plot: Divya Khosla Kumar, Rakul Preet Singh, Himansh Kohli and Nicole Faria appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Yaariyan. Later on Raveena Tandon makes a guest appearance in the show.

45.title: Jai Ho - Part 1
45.plot: Salman Khan makes an appearance on the show to promote his film 'Jai Ho'.

46.plot: Promotion of Jai Ho continues with Salman Khan, Sohail Khan and Daisy Shah on Comedy Nights with Kapil.

50.plot: The episode starts with a scintillating performance by the great singer, Daler Mehndi. Kapil welcomes, Dalerji with a warm hug and speaks about him. Kapil then starts his usual jokes and skits using the various characters of the show.

51.plot: Superstars of Bhojpuri cinema, Ravi Kishen, Manoj Tiwari and Nirahua join Kapil Sharma in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

52.plot: Arjun Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra and Ranveer Singh appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Gunday.

53.plot: Various artists join Bittu and his family as they celebrate Pinky Bua's wedding with Golden Bhai.

54.plot: Farhan Akhtar and Vidya Balan appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Shaadi Ke Side Effects.

58.plot: Madhuri Dixit and Juhi Chawla appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Gulaab Gang.

67.plot: The promotion of Bhoothnath Returns continues with Amitabh Bachchan and Boman Irani on Comedy Nights with Kapil.

72.plot: Virender Sehwag and Sunil Gavaskar join Kapil Sharma in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

75.plot: Actress and Former Miss Universe Sushmita Sen appears on Comedy Nights with Kapil.

77.plot: Vinod Khanna and Sunil Shetty appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Koleyaanchal.

78.plot: Popular Television actors Alok Nath and Toral Rasputra appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil as Bittu Sharma talks about the daily soaps that are currently being aired on Indian Television.

79.plot: Former Cricketer Kapil Dev joins Kapil Sharma in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

80.plot: Tochi Raina, Neeti Mohan, Kanika Kapoor and Meet Brothers participate in the 29th Imarti Devi International Granny Music Awards organized by Bittu and his family with duplicate International singers.

81.plot: Kumar Sanu and Alka Yagnik make Special appearances in the show. while Navjot Singh Sidhu serves as the permanent guest.

86.plot: Promotion of Sajid Khan's Humshakal's continues as Tamanna Bhatia and Esha Gupta, the leading ladies of the film, become a part of the proceedings.

91.plot: Kapil Sharma is joined by Master Chefs Sanjeev Kapoor and Vikas Khanna in this episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

99.plot: Bittu and his family make an attempt to relieve Daadi of her alcohol addiction. Later on Anupam Kher appears on Comedy Nights with Kapil as a special guest.

100.plot: Ajay Devgan and Kareena Kapoor Khan visit Kapil's house to promote their film Singham Returns.

119.plot: Comedy Nights with Kapil carries on with it's very special guest Rekha.

146.title: Amitabh Bachchan, Dhanush, Akshara Haasan and R. Balki
146.plot: Amitabh Bachchan, Dhanush, Akshara Haasan and R. Balki join Kapil Sharma in this week's episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Shamitabh.

147.title: Cast of Daily Soaps Aired on Colors
147.plot: Kapil is joined by the cast members of various soaps aired on Colors in this week's episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

148.title: Farah Khan & Sajid Khan
148.plot: Farah Khan and Sajid Khan visit Kapil's house in this week's episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of Farah Ki Daawat.

149.title: Harbhajan Singh and Shoaib Akhtar
149.plot: Cricketers Harbhajan Singh and Shoaib Akhtar arrive in Kapil's house in this week's episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

150.title: Anushka Sharma and Neil Bhoopalam
150.plot: Anushka Sharma and Neil Bhoopalam appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film NH10.

151.title: Kapil's wedding, Altaf Raja and Vikas Bahl
151.plot: In this week's episode, a flashback of Bittu and Manju's wedding is shown, while Vikas Bahl and Altaf Raja make an appearance for the promotion of their film Hunterrr.

152.title: Anu Malik and Kumar Sanu
152.plot: Anu Malik and Kumar Sanu make a special appearance in this week's episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

153.title: Sushant Singh Rajput & Anand Tiwari
153.plot: Sushant Singh Rajput and Anand Tiwari appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their movie Detective Byomkesh Bakshy.

154.title: Sunny Leone & Jay Bhanushali
154.plot: Sunny Leone and Jay Bhanushali appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Ek Paheli Leela.

155.title: Emraan Hashmi, Mahesh Bhatt, Vikram Bhatt and Amyra Dastur
155.plot: Emraan Hashmi, Mahesh Bhatt, Vikram Bhatt and Amyra Dastur appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Mr. X.

156.title: Revathi and Kalki Koechlin
156.plot: Revathi and Kalki Koechlin appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Margarita With A Straw.

157.title: Shruti Haasan and Akshay Kumar
157.plot: Shruti Haasan and Akshay Kumar appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Gabbar is Back.

158.title: Rannvijay Singh, Karan Kundra, Vijender Singh and Esha Deol, Mahaakshay Chakraborty, Evelyn Sharma, and Mohit Dutta
158.plot: Rannvijay Singh, Karan Kundra, Vijender Singh and Esha Deol visit Kapil's show for the promotion of Roadies X2 while Mahaakshay Chakraborty, Evelyn Sharma, and Mohit Dutta arrive for the promotion of their film Ishqedarriyaan.

159.title: Deepika Padukone, Irrfan Khan and Shoojit Sircar
159.plot: Deepika Padukone, Irrfan Khan and Shoojit Sircar appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Piku.

160.title: Tiger Shroff and Ahmed Khan
160.plot: Tiger Shroff and Ahmed Khan appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their video song "Zindagi Aa Raha Hoon Main".

161.title: Madhuri Dixit, Arshad Warsi, Jackky Bhagnani and Lauren Gottlieb
161.plot: Madhuri Dixit appears on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of her Dance Academy, Dance with Madhuri while Arshad Warsi, Lauren Gottlieb and Jackky Bhagnani visit Kapil's house for the promotion of their film Welcome To Karachi.

162.title: Ranveer Singh, Anil Kapoor and Anushka Sharma
162.plot: Ranveer Singh, Anil Kapoor and Anushka Sharma appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil to promote their film Dil Dhadakne Do.

163.title: Ranveer Singh, Anil Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra, Zoya Akhtar & Shefali Shetty
163.plot: Ranveer Singh, Anil Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra, Zoya Akhtar and Shefali Shetty visit Kapil's house to promote their film Dil Dhadakne Do.

164.title: Varun Dhawan, Shraddha Kapoor, Prabhu Deva & Remo D'souza
164.plot: Varun Dhawan, Shraddha Kapoor, Prabhu Deva and Remo D'Souza appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film ABCD 2.

165.title: The Great Khali, Annu Kapoor & Om Puri
165.plot: Dalip Singh Rana commonly known as The Great Khali appears in this edition of Comedy Nights with Kapil along with Om Puri and Annu Kapoor, who visit the show for the promotion of their film Miss Tanakpur Haazir Ho.

166.title: Dharmendra, Gippy Grewal & Geeta Basra
166.plot: Dharmendra, Gippy Grewal and Geeta Basra appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Second Hand Husband.

167.title: Salman Khan
167.plot: Salman Khan appears on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of his film Bajrangi Bhaijaan.

168.title: Salman Khan & Nawazuddin Siddiqui
168.plot: Salman Khan and Nawazuddin Siddiqui appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Bajrangi Bhaijaan.

169.title: Arshad Warsi as a host, Ajay Devgn, Tabu, Shriya Saran
169.plot: Ajay Devgan, Tabu and Shriya Saran appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil to promote their film Drishyam while Arshad Warsi acts as host in the absence of Kapil Sharma.

170.title: Riteish Deshmukh & Pulkit Samrat
170.plot: Riteish Deshmukh and Pulkit Samrat appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Bangistan while Sajid Khan acts as host in the absence of Kapil Sharma.

171.title: Kapil's Comeback Special
171.plot: Kapil Sharma returns as host of Comedy Nights with Kapil after a three week break.

172.title: Abhishek Bachchan, Rishi Kapoor and Supriya Pathak
172.plot: Abhishek Bachchan, Rishi Kapoor and Supriya Pathak appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film All Is Well.

173.title: Abhishek Bachchan, Rishi Kapoor, Asin and Umesh Shukla
173.plot: Abhishek Bachchan, Rishi Kapoor, Asin and Umesh Shukla appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film All Is Well.

174.title: Anil Kapoor, John Abraham and Shruti Haasan
174.plot: Anil Kapoor, John Abraham and Shruti Haasan appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Welcome Back.

175.title: Suresh Raina & Sushil Kumar
175.plot: Cricketer Suresh Raina and Wrestler Sushil Kumar appear as special guests on Comedy Nights with Kapil.

176.title: Gauhar Khan
176.plot: Gauhar Khan makes a special appearance in this week's edition of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

177.title: Elli Avram, Simran Kaur Mundi, Manjari Phadnis, Sai Lokur, Arbaaz Khan, Abbas Mustan & Dr Zeus
177.plot: Elli Avram, Simran Kaur Mundi, Manjari Phadnis, Sai Lokur, Arbaaz Khan, Dr. Zeus and Director Duo Abbas-Mustan appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of Kapil Sharma's debut movie Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon.

178.title: Akshay Kumar, Amy Jackson & Prabhudeva
178.plot: Akshay Kumar, Amy Jackson and Prabhudeva appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Singh Is Bliing.

179.title: Aishwarya Rai, Irfaan Khan & Sanjay Gupta
179.plot: Aishwarya Rai, Irfaan Khan and Sanjay Gupta appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Jazbaa.

180.title: Shahid Kapoor & Alia Bhatt
180.plot: Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Shandaar.

181.title: Sania Mirza
181.plot: Tennis player Sania Mirza appears as a special guest in this weeks edition of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

182.title: Salman Khan & Sonam Kapoor - Part I
182.plot: Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor visit Kapil's house for the promotion of their film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo.

183.title: Salman Khan & Sonam Kapoor - Part II
183.plot: Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo.

184.title: Ankit Tiwari, Kanika Kapoor & Badshah
184.plot: Popular singers Ankit Tiwari, Kanika Kapoor and Badshah make a special appearance in this week's episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

185.title: Ranbir Kapoor & Deepika Padukone
185.plot: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone and Imtiaz Ali appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Tamasha.

186.title: Shilpa Shetty, Daisy Shah, Zareen Khan, Karan Singh Grover and Sharman Joshi
186.plot: Shilpa Shetty makes a special appearance while Daisy Shah, Zareen Khan, Karan Singh Grover and Sharman Joshi visit Kapil's house for promoting their movie Hate Story 3.

187.title: Harbhajan Singh & Geeta Basra
187.plot: Cricketer Harbhajan Singh and Actress Geeta Basra appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil as special guests.

188.title: Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone
188.plot: Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Bajirao Mastani.

189.title: Shahrukh Khan, Kajol, Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon & Varun Sharma
189.plot: Shahrukh Khan, Kajol, Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon, Johnny Lever and Varun Sharma appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Dilwale.

190.title: Priyanka Chopra
190.plot: Priyanka Chopra appears on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of her film Bajirao Mastani.

191.title: Sunny Deol, Soha Ali Khan & Tisca Chopra
191.plot: Sunny Deol, Soha Ali Khan and Tisca Chopra appear on Comedy Nights with Kapil for the promotion of their film Ghayal Once Again.

192.title: Akshay Kumar & Nimrat Kaur
192.plot: Akshay Kumar and Nimrat Kaur visit Kapil's house for the promotion of their film Airlift in the final episode of Comedy Nights with Kapil.

imdb.title: Comedy Nights with Kapil
plot: Every episode starts with stage act of Kapil Sharma and various characters and then Kapil take one or more celebrity interview with co-actors.::Anonymous
synopsis: Renowned, actor-comedian Kapil Sharma makes his debut as a TV show producer with his new show Comedy Nights With Kapil. He will be seen multiple roles of an actor, scriptwriter and producer in his production debut. Already famous for his amazing comic timing and his talent to dig humor out of any situation, he is ready present everyday life in a fresh ad unique way.
